title: A basic statutory expert system
text:
Summary
Despite advances in generative AI, expert legal systems will continue to be necessary for legal tech and its applications. I plan to address the rationale behind this assumption in a later post. But for now, I will lay out a simple and intuitively-coded expert system that addresses a specific and basic legal problem.




flowchart TD
  A[Hard edge] --> B(Round edge)
  B --> C{Decision}
  C --> D[Result one]
  C --> E[Result two]







AI disclaimer
I’ve used the following AI tools to help create this project:

Spelling and grammar. Grammarly
Text summarization. ChatGPT-3.5 & 4
Code. ChatGPT-3.5 & 4, GitHub Copilot (GPT-3.5 based)
Legal research. CanLII
Images. DALL-E

title: About
text: I’m a staff lawyer with Legal Aid Saskatchewan based out of Swift Current. All work and opinions expressed on this site are mine, and not necessarily (or impliedly) my employer’s.
